Content.Text:
<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Hello.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not doing anything. Just spacing
out.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...
<MYNAME>, Yuri.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, both of you. What are you doing?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Eh? Y-Yuri, what are you doing?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Kyah!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hold still...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
B-But...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't mend this here. Come with me...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
H-Hold on a moment, Yuri.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Take your clothes off...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
W-W-What! I can't do that here! There
are people around!

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
...If you don't take them off, I can't
mend them.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You want to m-mend them?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Yes. Your clothes are so... so beat up.
<PAGE>
These clothes are top quality... so it
would be a shame... not to keep them
looking nice.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
S-Sorry. I hadn't really thought about
it.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yuri, please. Will you mend them for me?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Amazing! They look so wonderful. Look
at the sleeves!
<PAGE>
Yuri. Thank you so much for this!

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
No problem...
<PAGE>
Just come again if anything else
happens...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I will. Thank you again.
